newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixes a crash bug caused when sorting by plan description in the plan management window. * Fixes a bug in Mineral Worksheet where price provider wasn't added in the list. * Fixes an issue where EVEMon is spamming the API. * Fixes several visual issues when using large fonts.
